attributes.action: A person with presetal status e to be able to apply for brother or sis
attributes.additional_details: There are many people in Europe who would like to work in the UK
attributes.background: To give the right to persons who have received presetel status To apply to brothers or sisters who want to come to the UK To work and contribute to the state

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618653
